Review.Contenu: Prolly won’t be ordering again , the back and forth took forever, quality is okay and very confusing

THIS IS A SCAM:Do not use this company, they had the same contact address as the site for Cameraboxuk and are a scam.  The tracking number they provided for me was for someone else in the area, and the goods delivered via Fed Ex (confirmed) were for the other person.  My Bank has investigated and refunded my money.  Very plausible Customer Service exchange of Emails which ceased as soon as I had paid and then when notified of dispute, Cameraboxuk site removed.What ever the bargain do not use.ADDENDUM: For the purposes of clarity, the above refers to two websites in the Uk whose Contact Details stated that they are situated in Farnborough, Hampshire, UK, and nowhere else that I am aware of.

Review.Titre: The order has not been processed…
Review.Contenu: The order has not been processed because I never got the proof.

Review.Titre: awful and still haven't been refunded
Review.Contenu: Awful and hard to use so I canceled and ita already been a week I should have had cds made have gigs in three days and no money to purchase somewhere else.

I ordered 100 discs when I only needed 88 because it was cheaper to do so. I had issues with burning although. I had 15 discs error out during the process using my duplicater. I was able to print on my own discs for the three I needed so it worked out. I thought it might be the duplicater so after just having another project to burn about 50 discs I used our normal falcon media DVDs and had zero error out. I'm concerned about the quality of DVDs from media express.

Review.Titre: Just a bit tough to use on the mobile…
Review.Contenu: Just a bit tough to use on the mobile phone side of things. Other than that, not too bad.

Review.Titre: If I were to use your service again
Review.Contenu: If I were to use your service again, I would only do so if I had the time to request a physical proof prior to approving the work. The end-result of the disk was slightly off from the design wizard that I used on-line and, thus, is maddeningly incorrect. I am stuck with the disks and had to send them out but I will think twice before using your product again. I have a second round of discs to ship to clients and will most likely choose another vendor.

Review.Titre: Good job for the money but sound duplication not great.
Review.Contenu: Interaction with graphics dept was excellent at beginning of process but request to sound duplication dept went unanswered. The final CD digi pak had a mistake in graphic image that did not appear in my proof of same and sound reproduction of mastered CD was not as crisp as my original.Neither mistake was a deal breaker considering the reasonable cost for everything but had the graphic error been worse I would have returned all for a redo. For sure get a proof of everything and pray.

Review.Titre: Not terrible, but won't use again.
Review.Contenu: I ordered blank printed CDs with no packaging. I chose MediaXpress because they had the best prices. My main qualm with this company was the customer service. When I first called to ask questions, the person who answered - I think Matt? - seemed to be annoyed to have to talk to me, and told me to just go on the website so he wouldn't have to answer my questions. After I placed my order, they sent me a PDF with my cover design and it looked fine. When I actually received the CDs, the image (originally black and white) was very green. If I were more professional, I probably wouldn't have wanted to sell them. However, since I'm an indie musician, I decided it wasn't the end of the world. As per the title, their service could have been worse, but next time I will choose a different provider.
The Home Warehouse is a delivery service that will drop off your items, after the buyer bids on it. Give us a try @ THoWH.com
Helpful set of people. Prompt response to questions on technical issues.

The discs themselves sound great. The printed inserts look wonderful. The CD jewel case has serious issues with the anchoring "spokes" that hold the disc in place inside the case. In half the cases we examined (over 20 cases in all), the spokes have broken off, which will cause the disc to slip around during shipping. It is questionable whether we will use this vendor again.

Review.Titre: Excellent Service, but Website Needs Minor Updates
Review.Contenu: Overall, I am very satisfied with my experience working with MediaXpress on my CD duplication project. MediaXpress staff members are readily available for phone conversations and extremely friendly and helpful. MediaXpress.net is not a flashy website, but it's clean and generally simple to use for order placement. I had no difficulties ordering exactly what I wanted, and the CDs met all of my expectations for both the appearance of the artwork and the accuracy of the audio. I especially like that throughout the online ordering process, the cost of the project is continuously updated in real time based on the purchaser's choices (e.g., add UPC code vs. don't need one).However, there are two improvements that should be made to MediaXpress.net:1. Some of the instructions regarding how to format, save, and submit graphics files are a bit out of date. The instructions could use a revamp to be more reflective of current graphics software and formatting options.2. The order status checking option on the website isn't helpful. In my case, once I placed the order, my order status just continuously read "processing" throughout the week it took for the order to be completed, right up until the moment when a staff member called me to say the order was ready for pickup. That doesn't really qualify as order status tracking. This feature should either be modernized to give actual status updates or removed from the site to avoid causing frustration. (IMPORTANT NOTE: None of the above should be taken as a complaint about the one-week turnaround time. That is exactly the timeframe I was quoted by a staff member on the phone, so no worries there at all. I was only bothered by the unavailability of true order status checking.)

You probably shouldn't tell anyone this, but my bulk printed CDs that I ordered first thing in the morning were actually shipped out that afternoon. I'm sure I just hit that machine at the right time with a small enough quantity.

Review.Titre: I've mostly been pleased with the…
Review.Contenu: I've mostly been pleased with the service. However there was a bit of a disagreement with the shipping fee that wasnt included with the initial order. Not sure why the website didnt include this in the initial process of ordering. Overall, the quality of work remains stellar.

Review.Titre: The service was great and the artwork…
Review.Contenu: The service was great and the artwork turned out exactly as we uploaded it. The only critique I would give is that there was some dried ink on the back of a few of the CD-R's, making those unusable. Other than than, I feel this was a good value for the price and the order was received quickly.
2nd order. My only criticism is the DVD artwork comes out muted;  White is grey, etc. Otherwise everything was good. They were responsive throughout.

Very good service.  The website is a little clunky and I didn't understand that a pdf was not acceptable.  I thought it was but must have overlooked that in the instructions.  But once I got the right graphics to them they did everything as they said they would in the time frame they advertised.  I was very happy with the quick turn=around and the product quality! Excellent!
Easy design process. Quick turn around.  Fair pricing. 2 cases out of 100 came broken, othwerwise id give 5 stars. Overall happy, and would order again.
When placing a re-order of a DVD duplication there isn't a space to leave a note on the title of the project and any other details that are needed.

Review.Titre: I was hoping the disks were going to be…
Review.Contenu: I was hoping the disks were going to be Wrapped, but overall great communication, and fast service

I will send a better master next time. Volume is up on some songs. Thats on me.  All else is good . Thank you. This waa my first. I will doing more business witj you folks. Printing is great.  Thank you !!!
proofed and delivered on time.  Met all expectations.  Good value.

Review.Titre: everything came as i ordered it
Review.Contenu: everything came as i ordered it, very pleased with its outcome

MediaXpress was a little rocky when I first started using their services.  Since then, there has been a lot of improvement in both communication and service.  I placed my most recent order by emailing my account rep, and received the finished product in less than a week.  I would recommend this company to my business associates in a heartbeat.

Review.Titre: Happy with the product, but not the customer service
Review.Contenu: I ordered some cd's. I was very happy with the product, but they were not ready when they were supposed to be. When I inquired about when they would be ready, no one got back to me. When I finally got the cd's, though, I was very happy with how they turned out.

We have used MediaXpress several times now and have had a professional and enjoyable experience each time.  They produce a product of good value for the money so I would recommend them and encourage anyone with similar requirements to consider their services.

Review.Pseudo: Pat, Cruising Notes books and seminars
Review.Contenu: We have used MediaXpress for three years and like their product and REALLY like working with the staff. They have helped make the 'glitches' go away. Pat

Review.Titre: very good. The administrative process could be simplified. Too many cooks in the kitchen.
Review.Contenu: Once the order is placed, there is confusion as to where the appropriate file should be uploaded. I had to upload twice because the middle man that asked for the uploading and declared himself satisfied, disappeared from view in the last step and the system asked me to upload again. The link with Paypal is not smooth, as if the seller was afraid of promoting the paypal alternative to credit card. I did not want to release credit card information in a blanket form as requested to do and that required a nice lady to intervene by email. No problem per se here, but that is an unecessary overhead for your company.The DVDs received were perfectly printed and so I am satisfied with the work done and will order again.This confusion is typical of web sites written by half amateurs that do not test properly their own cooking. Hopefully It will improve with time.

Review.Pseudo: Carmen Del Plato delplato music industries
Review.Contenu: The only thing I would change would be to allow the text boxes to have more than one line.  It was difficult to line up the lines and make them all centered!!!
Great customer service and great products. Easy to use website!
price could be a bit better.  the product is good.

So far working with MediaXpress is easy and very professional. I say so far because the product hasn't arrived yet but based on past experience, I expect it will be amazing and excellent quality (like the last time) Thank you Max... until the next time.Best Regards,John Michael Roch

Review.Titre: Outstanding business experience for the small business person

I will say, I have always used another company that is quite well known. After working with Max, Jessica, and the others at Mediaxpress, I will not not change again! They are totally professional, courteous, detail oriented, and overall wonderful to work with. The turnaround was fast and the quality is wonderful! 5+ stars/ Highly recommend!

Review.Titre: SCAMMERS ARE USING THIS COMPANY'S GOOD NAME
Review.Contenu: Folks, please do not mistake MediaXpress.net with the scammers at MediaXpress.co.uk.The co.uk website is conning people. But they have linked the legitimate and by all accounts trustworthy US company's .net website to this TrustPilot page. So, they are not only scamming people, they are also causing a reputable, family-run business a lot of damage in reputation and lost revenue.I've been conned, like many others and hopefully, we'll get our monies returned. But the harm it is causing a legitimate company is also concerning and deeply unfair.So again:MediaXpress.net - GoodMediaXpress.co.uk - Low Life Scum

This was my first order with MediaXpress, and the customer service from initial inquiry to production to billing to shipping was all outstanding. The entire team was really accessible and responsive. They even offered accurate tech help when I needed it. And, amidst a big storm they went out of their way to make sure that my shipment arrived on time. It just doesn't get any better than this.

And it didn't cost an arm and a leg! Thank you!

Review.Contenu: I been ordering with them for years and they always helped me meet my deadline with printing and shipping i will continue to use them for my company. And one day i hope my offspring will use them too

Review.Titre: Sorry for your company  getting  bad…

Customer service is always great and turn around is quick! I know the product will always be top quality too! I've been using them for duplication services for several years now and have always had a great experience!

Review.Titre: Easy to work with and quick turnaround.

Needed 450 duplications of a cd.  Called and spoke with Matt who walked me through the whole process.  The quality of the cds were professional and sounded better than what I expected. After working with MediaXpress for years, they still continue to show the same commitment to quality and customer service that impressed me to begin with. That's why I keep coming back, lol. Cheers, mates! Keep up the great work.

I have never used a duplication service before, and asked some newbie questions, I'm sure. The folks at MediaXpress treated me like I was an old friend. Excellent service, friendly people, great prices, and a product that was exactly what I'd hoped for. #customerforlife

We are a non-profit church organization. This company was the only one that recognized us as a non-profit and gave us an excellent cost per flash drive plus did not charge for the words we wanted printed on each flash drive - They were speedy in the delivery & very pleasant by email

Excellent product, fast shipping and exactly what we were hoping for. Next time I think I will have you do the logos for us, because it's proving to be much more difficult to do this in house. We can't wait to see how our customers enjoy the custom USB's!
Easy Process. The DIY disc design customizer was a game changer. Better than any of the other disc printing services that I found in my searching online.

Review.Titre: MediaXpress is now my go to for DVD …
Review.Contenu: MediaXpress is now my go to for DVD replication. I have now used them five times and each time they have hit it out of the park. Great pricing, amazing DVD label print quality, low volume options, and quick service mean I won't be going anywhere else soon.

We have worked with MediaXpress for many years and have always received great service. Printing, CDs, they do everything so well. For independent artists who need CD replication, MediaXpress is where to go!

I am very grateful and I highly recommend for anyone who needs CD Duplicating/Replicating services, MediaXpress is definitely the right place to choose!
